0001.name: Helper
0001.description: Be a good citizen, help other people and earn sweet money!
0001.details: Help people as much as you can, and they might give you some money! There can also be times that you don't get money and sometimes, you get huge rewards!

0002.name: Salesman
0002.description: Become a lawyer, advice and represent your clients in legal matters!
0002.details: Become a lawyer, advice and represent your clients in legal matters. You might even get your hands on big cases! although ghosting will be no less...

0003.name: Lawyer
0003.description: Become a lawyer, advice and represent your clients in legal matters!
0003.details: Become a lawyer, advice and represent your clients in legal matters. You might even get your hands on big cases! although ghosting will be no less...
